site.name: OpenDOSM
site.description: Terokailah pelbagai jenis data terbitan DOSM. Jika data itu minyak yang baru, maka keterbukaan itulah saluran yang memaksimumkan kegunaannya.

header: Data: The backbone of effective governance
description: OpenDOSM is a platform that catalogs, visualises, and analyses DOSM's wealth of data. Everything on this site is open-sourced and freely available for the nation's benefit. If data is the new oil, then openness is the pipeline that maximises its value.

dashboard.title: Explore our hottest dashboards
dashboard.description: These dashboards have been getting attention, but don't forget to check out our full collection of dashboards!

catalogue.title: Study our most popular datasets
catalogue.description: To search for something specific, use our data catalogue - it hosts every open dataset from Malaysia's public sector.
